basis: The user explicitly commits to starting immediately with a concrete plan and contingencies, indicating a high likelihood of following through.
cognitive_dissonance: Low; actions align with stated intentions and there is a general acceptance of urges without judgment. Minor tension around cravings is acknowledged but mitigated by concrete strategies.
negative_thought_patterns: Occasional all-or-nothing framing (e.g., 'if cravings stay, ...'), but largely balanced; tendency to rely on structured logs and plans may reduce rumination.
emotional_triggers: Heat/temperature (37Â°C range implied earlier), time windows with BED cravings, mood fluctuations, hunger cues, craving spikes.
coaching_notes: User responds well to clear, actionable steps and urge logging. Maintain concise, concrete plans, encourage early-window strategies ( grounding, short walks ), and continue reinforcing non-judgmental stance. Consider reinforcing fast-check-ins and sharing patterns to tailor interventions.
